remake.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a record or film that has the same music or story as one that was made before
remake.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to film a story or record a piece of music again
remake.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: It was remade as a musical.
remake.translation[1].definitions[1].def: to build or make something again
remake.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: She remade her wedding dress to fit her daughter.
